Paragraph: 94WN0263A Kiev HOLOS UKRAYINY in Ukrainian 20 Apr 94 p 6

```
| Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| HOLOS UKRAYINY | Kiev | Yes |
| HOLOS UKRAYINY | Ukrainian | No |
```
Explanation:

* HOLOS UKRAYINY is headquartered in Kiev, Ukrainian.
* HOLOS UKRAYINY operates in Ukrainian, but it is not clear if it is based in Ukrainian.

Note: The paragraph only mentions Kiev as a location, so it is assumed that HOLOS UKRAYINY is based in Kiev, Ukrainian. If there is additional information that suggests otherwise, the table can be updated accordingly.
